data.title: Nancy Carlson Is Wed to Timothy Berners
data.text:
Nancy Carlson and Timothy J. Berners-Lee were married yesterday at the Greenfield Hill Congregational Church in Fairfield, Conn., by the Rev. George C. Bland. Mrs. Berners-Lee is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. D. Bret Carlson of Fairfield. Her husband is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Conway Berners-Lee of London.

The bride, a graduate of Brown University, is a programmer analyst with the World Health Organization in Geneva, and her husband, a graduate of Oxford University, is a software engineer with the European Particle Physics Laboratory there. The bride's father retired as a partner in the New York law firm of Debevoise & Plimpton. The bridegroom's father is a retired mathematician.
